snippet: Homes and businesses owned by Christians, as well as churches and monasteries, have been looted and burned since the president’s ouster.
abstract: Egypt's Coptic Christian minority has become target of Islamist anger in wake of Pres Mohamed Morsi's ouster.
lead_paragraph: Homes and businesses owned by Christians, as well as churches and monasteries, have been looted and burned since the president’s ouster.

headline.main: Islamists Seize Town in Southern Egypt and Attack Christians
headline.print_headline: Islamists Seize Town in Southern Egypt and Attack Christians

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
